Package algorithms.util

Class CornerArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.util.CornerArray
  • public class CornerArray
extends java.lang.Object
    class to hold x and y arrays of points along with the edge indexes and the SIGMA of the scale space curve that the points were last updated from. Note that most uses of the class expect that the points are ordered by increasing idx values.
    Author:
    nichole
